title: What is the meaning of DOA in the song 'I'll be there for you'? - Quora

response.answer_text: DOA Stands For : Date of Accident Degree Of Agreement  Delegation of Authority Defective On Arrival. Dead on Arrival The terms is used in the "Friends" theme song, which is "I'll Be There for You" by The Rembrandts. The lyrics using the term are seen below: "So no one told you life was gonna be this wayYour job's a joke, you're broke, your love life's D.O.A." DOA stands for "dead on arrival" It can also mean 'Deteriorate on Approach'. Friends, as we all know, is a sitcom about six friends, and the comedic and romantic situations that they face with each other.
D.O.A means Dead on Arrival which can be loosely translated to non-existent. So, your love life's D.O.A means your love life's non-existent.
